column3:
MS14.1 - Plutus Core: CIP-0132: dropList primitive
Deliverables: The dropList primitive for Plutus

MS14.2 - Plutus Core: CIP-0109: modexp primitive
Deliverables: The modexp primitive for Plutus

MS14.3 - Plutus Core: CIP-0138: builtin arrays
Deliverables: The built-in array type, and primitives for operating on arrays

MS14.4 - Plutus Core: CIP-0153: builtin value
Deliverables: The built-in value type, and primitives for operating on values

MS14.5 - Plutus Core: CIP-0133: MSM primitive
Deliverables: The MSM primitive for Plutus

MS14.6 - Plutus Core: CIP-0112: Observe script type
Deliverables: A new script purpose - Observe, for Plutus V4

MS14.7- Plutus Core: Support case analysis on builtin types
Deliverables: Support case analysis on Bool, Integer and Data

MS14.8 - Plutus Core: Pattern matching primitives
Deliverables: The pattern matching primitives for Plutus. May not be worthwhile once case analysis on builtin types is implemented - to be determined.

MS14.9 - Plutus Core: Introduce Plutus V4 as a new Plutus ledger language version
Deliverables: Plutus V4

MS14.10 - Plutus Core: Plinth (Plutus Tx) compiler and library enhancement 
Deliverables: (1) support inlining for recursive bindings; (2) implement new compiler optimizations targeting new language extensions (3) make the new (data-based) API more comprehensive and efficient

MS14.11 - Plutus Core: Plinth (Plutus Tx) developer tooling enhancement
Deliverables: (1) Remove the requirement of using Nix for setup (2) Support at least two major GHC versions (3) Make the UPLC executable easier to use

MS14.12 - Plutus Core: Plutus language performance benchmark 
Deliverables: Develop a benchmark comparing the performance of various surface languages targeting UPLC, such as Plinth, Aiken, plu-ts and Plutarch.

MS14.13 - Plutus Core: Plinth (Plutus Tx) compiler certifier: initial release
Deliverables: Initial release of the certifier focusing on certifying UPLC optimizations

MS15.1 - Tiered Pricing Models: Transaction Prioritization Framework
Deliverables: Test system with initial prioritization algorithms implemented

MS15.2 - Tiered Pricing Models: AI Congestion Prediction Service
Deliverables: Working AI service with historical and real-time data ingestion

MS15.3 - Tiered Pricing Models: Wallet Integration & Testnet Launch
Deliverables: Updated wallet UI; functioning testnet environment

MS15.4 - Tiered Pricing Models: Assured Channel Design Finalization
Deliverables: Assured channel specification; socialized CIP draft

MS15.5 - Tiered Pricing Models: Cardano Problem Statement & Revised CIPs
Deliverables: CIP document(s) covering congestion handling and assured channel logic

MS16.1 - Transaction Monitoring System: State-of-the-art report
Deliverables: Report on fraud and anomaly detection. Specification of the Backend analysis

MS16.2 - Transaction Monitoring System: Alpha version of the backend
Deliverables: Release in the open source repository. Live version on a selection of Dapps or wallets on a testnet with a rough UI

MS16.3 - Transaction Monitoring System: Frontend for data visualization and alert mechanism
Deliverables: Code available in the open source repository. Website with the new Front end visualization. Roadmap for future integration
